Axon.ivy Project Build Plugin
Last Published: 2015-12-24  | Version: 6.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Axon.ivy Project Build Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Reports

project-build:compileProject

Full name:

com.axonivy.ivy.ci:project-build-plugin:6.0.1-SNAPSHOT:compileProject

Description:

Compiles an ivy Project with an ivyEngine.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.
  • Since version: 6.0.0.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
ivyVersion String 6.0.0 The ivy Engine version that is used. Must be equal or higher than MINIMAL_COMPATIBLE_VERSION
Default value is: 6.0.1.
User property is: ivyVersion.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
buildApplicationDirectory File 6.0.0 Home application where the project to build and its dependencies will be temporary deployed.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/ivyBuildApp.
engineCacheDirectory File 6.0.0 Location where ivy engines in required version can be extracted to.

If the Engine does not yet exist, it can be automatically downloaded.


Default value is: ${settings.localRepository}/.cache/ivy.
User property is: engineCacheDirectory.
engineDirectory File 6.0.0 Location where an unpacked (may pre-configured) ivy Engine in the required version exists.

If parameter is not set it will be a sub-directory of the engineCacheDirectory.

If the Engine does not yet exist, it can be automatically downloaded.


User property is: engineDirectory.
localRepository ArtifactRepository 6.0.0 (no description)
Default value is: ${localRepository}.

Parameter Details

buildApplicationDirectory:

Home application where the project to build and its dependencies will be temporary deployed.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 6.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/ivyBuildApp

engineCacheDirectory:

Location where ivy engines in required version can be extracted to.

If the Engine does not yet exist, it can be automatically downloaded.

  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 6.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: engineCacheDirectory
  • Default: ${settings.localRepository}/.cache/ivy

engineDirectory:

Location where an unpacked (may pre-configured) ivy Engine in the required version exists.

If parameter is not set it will be a sub-directory of the engineCacheDirectory.

If the Engine does not yet exist, it can be automatically downloaded.

  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 6.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: engineDirectory

ivyVersion:

The ivy Engine version that is used. Must be equal or higher than MINIMAL_COMPATIBLE_VERSION
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 6.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: ivyVersion
  • Default: 6.0.1

localRepository:

(no description)
  • Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.repository.ArtifactRepository
  • Since: 6.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${localRepository}
